response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000. This offer takes into account both the worth of the product and the opportunity cost for you. Should you require more information or have any concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
